In England, in the seven days to 24 November, there were 248,888 new confirmed cases (440.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 November, there were 235,641 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 6% (13,247 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 November is 8,639,754 (15,278 cases per 100,000 population).
